Attitude yang pertama: "Rajin dan consisten" Iaitu istiqomah dan sentiasa membuat promosi. Bila bersimbang dengan rakan-rakan cerita TE, chat dalam YM cerita TE, sembang di Skype cerita TE, rakan-rakan datang berjumpa saya, saya cerita TE, rakan-rakan ajak belanja makan cerita TE, jiran-jiran ajak sembang petang-petang cerita TE, kemana sahaja saya akan bercerita pasal TE. Non-stop. Attitude yang kedua: Saya hanya bercerita kepada orang yang nak dengar, jika ada orang yang cakap "NO" saya cakap "NEXT". Itu sahaja. Biasalah, kita jumpa macam-macam ragam manusia, ada yang tanya bukan-bukan punya soalan. Contohnya ada yang tanya: "En Lan, TE ni ada lesen meniaga tak, boleh tunjukkan kepada saya" Sudah tentu saya akan jawab "tak ada" "En. Lan, katanya celcom pegang saham TE 35%, boleh tunjukkan buktinya tak?" Saya akan jawab "Tak ada" "En. Lan boleh tunjukkan bukti yang TE bayar kedalam akaun En Lan tak, sebab takut, bila buat nanti mereka tak bayar?" Saya jawab "Memang mereka tak bayar" "Habis mengapa En Lan buat juga bisnes TE ni" Saya jawab " Sebab saya cadangkan awak jangan join bisnes ni" - Sebenarnya Sebab utama saya tak ada masa untuk jawab soalan-soalan yang susah macam ni. - Sebab ketika guru saya mengajar waktu sekolah dulu-dulu, kalau jawab soalan periksa, jawab soalan senang dulu, tinggalkan soalan susah. Saya tak ada masa untuk melayan seseorang yang susah sebegitu, banyak sangat pantang larang untuk mereka merebut sesuatu peluang. Ramai lagi orang diluar sana yang akan nampak ini merupakan suatu peluang keemasan untuk mereka menyambarnya. Jika saya layan, akan banyaklah masa saya akan terbazir, sedangkan masih ramai, malah berjuta-juta yang berfikiran positif sedang menunggu kita untuk buka mulut sahaja kepada mereka, dan mereka akan ambil peluang ini. Apa faedah yg kita dapat? . Dengan menjadi Agent Topup kita akan mendapat kebaikan seperti berikut:- . ğŸ‘‰1. kebaikan pertama, setiap pembelian topup utk diri sendiri kita sudah jimat. Kalau kita beli topup RM100 di 7Eleven contohnya, kita bayar kos sebenar RM100 kpd 7Eleven.Tetapi dgn menjadi Agent Topup, contoh kalau beli Tune Talk, kita cuma bayar RM92.50 utk nilai topup RM100. Kita dah jimat RM7.50. Kita topup bukan utk diri kita sahaja bukan, kita j...uga topup juga utk wife/husband, anak2 dan sedara-mara yg duduk serumah.Jadi satu keluarga mendapat manafaatnya...ğŸ˜ƒ . ğŸ‘‰2. kebaikan kedua, kita sudah jimat tenaga, usaha, duit, masa, bayar parking sbb sudah tak perlu start moto/kereta untuk pergi ke 7Eleven atau pergi ke mana-mana kedai menjual topup. Jadi kerja kita lebih mudah dan selesa. Bukankah itu yg kita mahukan? . ğŸ‘‰3. kebaikan ketiga, kita boleh menjual topup kpd rakan2, rangkaian kita, rakan sekerja, rakan satu Universiti dll. Kita boleh dpt komisen sehingga 7.5%. Sapa nak bagi 7.5%, kan?...ğŸ˜ƒ Kalau dulu, yg dapat komisen adalah 7Eleven atau kedai topup, tapi kini apabila rakan atau rangkaian kita membeli topup dgn kita, kita pulak yg dapat komisen itu. . dan...dan...dan... . ğŸ”· "impak" yg paling penting sebenarnya, mengapa saya galakkan sangat bro/sis buat juga bisnes topup, adalah utk melengkapkan bisnes Tone Plus kita. . Bayangkan kalau semua rangkaian kita ada 10 ribu orang, dan mereka gembira, senang, jimat menggunapakai Tone Plus, maka bisnes Tone Plus kita akan benar2 kukuh & stabil sbb mereka sudah menjadi pengguna yg setia, tambah pulak kalau mereka sudah boleh buat duit pasti mereka akan menjadi pengguna tegar.. dengan itu bisnes kita bakal berkembang, sbb pengguna yg gembira akan lebih mudah menceritakan dan berkongsi pengalaman mereka dgn org lain (dgn prospek mereka). . Bila semua rangkaian downline kita terus menerus pakai Tone Plus sbb mereka happy dgn keselesaan, happy dgn penjimatan, happy dgn faedah2 Tone Plus. Maka selama itulah kita bakal menjana pendapatan pasif... pasif income yg bakal membesar setiap bulan...ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ˜ƒ ğŸŒ http://bit.ly/fbteamtitan #TeamTitan #pasifincome #groupsupport #simkadajaib #prepaidthatpays #onexox #roketemel #simkadvvip #celcom #maxis #digi #umobile #gelombangbirutitan #mautakmau ğŸ“¡ONEXOXğŸ“¡ simkad JIMATâœ… Syarikat Muslimâœ… Coverage Celcomâœ… Simkad hanya RM10âœ…... Kalau anda tak minat, itu terpulang.Saya tak rugi apa-apa......  Kenapa saya nak sangat cerita pasal TONE EXCEK ni???  Sebab saya sendiri rasa rugi sebelum ni..Saya tak cadangkan anda untuk ubah terus telco. Tapi, sila pastikan anda baca & faham dulu 5 SEBAB anda patut TUKAR telco TONE EXCEL...... (1) Setiap kali topup, anda dapat komisyen. (2) Setiap kali anda bantu kawan lain gunakan simkad Tone Excel, anda dapat dua jenis komisyen. Komisyen perkenalkan simkad, dan juga komisyen setiap kali dia topup sampai bila-bila. (3) Anda boleh kumpul poin setiap kali topup untuk dapatkan claim tiket penerbangan daripada Air Asia secara PERCUMA.. (4) Syarikat ini bergabung dengan Air Asia dan Celcom supaya anda dapat perkhidmatan yang terbaik. Dah la terbaik, dapat ganjaran pula tu. (5) Komisyen yang bakal anda terima adalah TANPA HAD. Selagi mana anda aktif gunakan Tone Excel sebagai telco, dan selalu topup setiap bulan Topup setiap bulan hampir RM100, tapi tak dapat ganjaran yang menarik pun. Jadi, kalau anda nak beli simkad Tone Excel (dan juga cara bina pendapatan sampingan yang mewah) Whatsapp terus utk tahu lebih lanjut 0133183785 ğŸ˜Š Ini fakta. Pada saat anda on henfon anda dan melayari internet, tauke2 telco senyum. Tauke celcom, digi, u-mobile, tune talk, maxis, altel, xox. Walau di mana mereka berada, walau apa yg mereka sedang buat, anda bayar mereka. Saya pun nak jadik macam tauke2 telco tu. Tak dapat banyak sikit pun Alhamdulillah. Sebab tu saya join komuniti rujukan #toneexcel. Tapi ramai kawan2 saya tak support saya sebab mereka lebih suka membuat orang yang mereka tidak kenal senyum daripada memb...uat rakan2 mereka senyum. Malah mereka pun boleh tersenyum sama. Farah 01135372888 ## LTE SERVER UPGRADE ## Assalamualaikum & Salam Sejahtera. PERHATIAN .... Dimaklumkan bahawa Celcom akan membuat kerja-kerja menaiktaraf sistem penyedia rangkaian LTE di beberapa kawasan di bahagian utara, selatan & timur semenanjung Malaysia. Penyelenggaraan ini akan menyebabkan gangguan kepada PANGGILAN KELUAR MASUK, SMS, MMS & DATA. Masa & kawasan terjejas adalah seperti di bawah ; Tarikh : 19 APRIL 2016 Masa : 12:00am - 6:00am Tempoh : 6 Jam  UTARA : BALING, BALIK PULAU, BAYAN LEPAS, TAPAH, BATU GAJAH, IPOH MERU, IPOH METRO, TG RAMBUTAN, KOTA SETAR, KUALA KANGSAR, KUALA MUDA, KUBANG PASU, KULIM, LANGKAWI, LARUT, MATANG, MANJUNG, LUMUT, PADANG TERAP, PERAK TENGAH, KANGAR, NIBONG TEBAL, BUKIT MERTAJAM, JURU, PMTG PAUH, BAGAN, KEPALA BATAS, TASEK GELUGOR, BKT BENDERA, GELUGOR, GEORGETOWN, JELUTONG, TG BUNGAH, ULU PERAK  SELATAN : MELAKA, SEREMBAN, NUSAJAYA, TEBRAU, BUKIT BARU, BACHANG, METRO, BANDAR SRI ALA, BATU PAHAT, BAHAU, KUALA PILAH, KULAIJAYA, PASIR GUDANG, KEMPAS, MOUNT AUSTIN, ULU TIRAM, LINGGI, MUAR, SENAWANG,  GEMAS, GEMENCHEH, SEGAMAT,LABU, RANTAU, KLUANG, MOLEK, BATU PAHAT, PARIT RAJA, REMBAU, MASJID TANAH, ALOR GAJAH, TANGGA BATU, JEMPOL, SKUDAI   TIMUR : RAUB, MENTAKAB, PEKAN, MUADZAM, BENTONG, JENGKA, KG AWAH  Semoga pemberitahuan ini dapat disampaikan ke semua pengguna setia ONEXOX untuk mengelakkan sebarang masalah. Dinasihatkan juga agar para pengedar di kawasan yang berkenaan "berehat" malam ini bagi mengelakkan sebarang isu yang mungkin berlaku kelak. Terima kasih. #outtherewerareone #onexox4g #onesys #onexox Assalamualaikum semua dan selamat petang.. Tauke celcom, digi, u-mobile, tune talk, maxis, altel, xox. Walau di mana mereka berada, walau apa yg mereka sedang buat, anda bayar mereka. Saya pun nak jadik macam tauke2 telco tu. Tak dapat banyak sikit pun Alhamdulillah. Sebab tu saya join komuniti rujukan #toneexcel. Johnson Wey Dato Bryan Tay Saya nak SHARE 30 SEBAB  KENAPA ANDA PERLU BUAT BISNES "TUNE TALK TONE EXCEL" INI SEKARANG! ==========================  .... 1. Anda boleh MENGEKALKAN  NO TELEFON kesayangan anda :-)  . 2. Tiada had masa -  boleh buat cepat atau perlahan :-)  . 3. Anda boleh memperkenalkan SIM KAD  ini kepada sesiapa sahaja tanpa had :-)  . 4. Bonus dibayar 3 kali sebulan (11hb, 21hb, 31hb) :-) . 5. Tiada produk untuk dijual, hanya  perkenalkan simcard Tone Excel sahaja :-) . 6. Anda top up anda dapat BONUS,  kawan anda top up anda juga  dapat BONUS, BEST kan? . 7. Tak perlu ingatkan rakan di dalam  network utk top up sebab memang  mereka selalu topup :-) . 8. TAK PERLU SIMPAN STOK . 9. TAK PERLU MENJUAL . 10. TAK PERLU BUAT PRODUK DEMO . 11. Penyelenggaraan rendah-  RM20/bulan sahaja (maintain topup),  guna jer mcm biasa. :-) . 12.Kos rendah untuk memulakan perniagaan . 13. Pasaran meluas  (Lebih 37 juta pengguna telefon bimbit) :-) . 14. Produk yang diperlukan  hampir semua orang . 15. Umur 12 tahun dah ada IC pun  boleh turut serta . 16. Terbuka kepada bukan warganegara  yang memiliki passport  . 17.Satu cara mudah untuk mendapatkan  pendapatan pasif seumur hidup  . 18. Dapat PELINDUNGAN INSURAN  KEMALANGAN RM100K PERCUMA  . 19. Dapat point boleh tukar dengan  tiket Airsia PERCUMA :-)  . 20. Lucky draw setiap minggu/bulan . 21. Bonus 2 bulan sekali dan setahun sekali  . 22. Bonus Umrah (muslim) dan  Percutian (non muslim)  . 23. Bonus introducer paling tinggi  dan Bonus Topup paling tinggi :-)  . 24. Income boleh diwarisi sampai bila2  selagi simkad anda top up tiap bulan RM20  . 25. Ikut coverage celcom, di mana  ada celcom disitu ada Tone Excel  . 26. Boleh topup dimana saje  sama dengan telco yg lain  . 27. Boleh buat call/sms/internet (data plan)  . 28. Diiktiraf oleh Lembaga Pelindung  dan Kebajikan Pengguna Malaysia (LPKPM)  . 29. Menjadi biz partner sykt2 besar  spt Stesen2 minyak, Bank2, 7e, Giant, Tesco dll  . 30. Dimiliki oleh sebuah syarikat yang  sangat kukuh iaitu Tune Group yang  mana dibawahnya adalah syarikat AirAsia,  Tune Money, Tune Hotels, Tune Talk,  Tone Excel, Tune Insurance dll  . Amacam?? KEPERLUAN>>> Telefon bimbit ini merupakan satu keperluan semua orang untuk berhubung. . . BERKUALITI>>> Menggunakan prasarana tune talk yang menggunakan coverage celcom. Dimana ada line celcom disitu ada line Tone excel. . . TIDAK BERMUSIM>>> Setiap saat & masa orang akan menggunakan telefon bimbit. . . ANTI EKONOMI MELESET>>> walaupun zaman kegawatan ekonomi, mereka masih tetap gunakan telefon bimbit. . . PRASARANA SEDIA ADA>>> Pasaran luas. Lebih 41 juta pengguna telefon bimbit adalah bakal pelanggan anda. . . Pendapatan PASIF>>> Selagi orang guna handphone/TOPUP selagi itu kita akan dapat duit. Walaupun kita bukan penjual TOPUP, buat sekali untung berkali-kali. Ambil masa 5 minit untuk berfikir. . . UNLIMITED CALL>>>  - Bagus. Tapi nak cakap dengan sapa lama-lama? Sampai 24 jam? Sekarang bukan zaman bergayut. . . UNLIMITED SMS>>> - bagus. Tapi zaman sekarang ni kurang dah orang nak gunakan sms. . . UNLIMITED INTERNET>>> - Bagus. Nak download apa banyak-banyak? Boleh download duit ke? Boleh bagi anda makan? . . UNLIMITED INCOME>>> - PALING BAGUS dan TERBAIK..!! Bila anda ada ultimated passive INCOME, semua di atas akan automatik akan jadi ultimated. Nak call lama, nak sms banyak2 nak download banyak tiada masalah..yang penting bebas masa bersama keluarga tercinta.. . . Duit bukan segalanya..TAPI zaman la nie segalanya memerlukan duit.. Jumpa anda di legend gym malam ni yer ğŸ˜œ ğŸ˜œ ğŸ’ªğŸ’ªğŸ‘ŒğŸ‘Œâ˜ºâ˜º Kenapa saya kata bisnes TONE PLUS (TTTP) ni paling TERBAIK??? . Simple sajer.. Anda pasang Astro berapa kali? Anda pasang Streamyx berapa kali? Anda pasang meter elektrik TNB/SESB kat rumah berapa kali?  .... Anda beli simkad anda berapa kali? Jawapannya mudah, SEKALI SAHAJA seumur hidup. . Tapi anda bayar Astro, Streamyx, TNB, SESB, berapa kali? Jawapannya mudah, BERKALI-KALI tiap-tiap bulan. . Sama juga dengan perniagaan TTTP, Anda jual simkad hanya SEKALI tapi anda dibayar BERKALI-KALI setiap kali mereka topup. . Cuba sebut ayat di atas berkali-kali dalam hati anda,  "Aku jual simkad SEKALI, tapi dibayar BERKALI-KALI..."  "Aku jual simkad SEKALI, tapi dibayar BERKALI-KALI..." "Aku jual simkad SEKALI, tapi dibayar BERKALI-KALI..." . Lepas tu, cuba tanya diri anda,  "Apa bisnes simple yang anda jual sekali tapi dibayar berkali-kali?" Tanpa ganggu keje hakiki anda? Boleh Buat part-time saja.. Jawapannya ada di Tone Plus. . Ok, sekarang jom kita buat kira-kira... Katakan, anda jual simkad ni kepada 10 orang dan semua topup RM30, anda akan dapat 13% daripada nilai topup mereka: 10 orang = RM39.00 100 orang = RM390.00 1,000 orang = RM3,900.00 10,000 orang = RM39,000.00 100,000 orang = RM390,000.00 1,000,000 orang = RM3,900,000.00 . âœ” Jumlah di atas tu kalau dorang topup RM30. Belum lagi kalau mereka topup RM50 atau RM100. âœ” Income di atas bukan SEKALI, tapi SETIAP BULAN. Itu namanya pasif income.. . Sekarang anda tahu kenapa syarikat telco2 untung berbillion-billion setiap tahun dan kita sebagai pengguna semakin 'pokai' sebab beli reload setiap tahun mereka. . So, kepada yang belum lagi upgrade simkad kepada simkad TTTP, bertukarlah, upgradelah sekarang dan jadikan handphone anda sebagai sumber pendapatan kedua. . Akan ada lebih banyak hadiah menanti termasuk hadiah ISTIMEWA untuk kategori Grand Prize. Celcom Prepaid X-Pax TEMPOH KREDIT For 1 Year / 2 Year For Celcom Prepaid User.   Tempoh Kredit Term & Conditions 1.This Promotion is open to all Prepaid customers with Active Status 2.Customer pay RM30 or RM50 & get 1 or 2 years VALIDITY  EXP1 send to 28882 - RM30 will be deducted for 1year validity. EXP2 send to 28882 - RM50 will be deducted for 2years validity. T&C FOR EXP1 : After reload RM30, you will get 6months ONLY, to get another 6months you have to reload another RM30. So total = 1yr validity after you reload RM30 (deduction) + RM30 balance. T&C FOR EXP2 : After reload RM50, you will get 6months ONLY, to get another 18months you have to reload another RM30. So total = 2yrs validity after you reload RM50 (deduction) + RM30 balance. T&C for EXP1 and EXP2 : Another RM30 balance has to reload within 6months time after activated EXP1 / EXP2.  Just dial *118#, choose My Prepaid.. and next, choose Credit Validity.. since the menu available at *118# also, not *119# only then no need to change plan..... See more Hello there Maxis customer service, I would like to highlight to you the problem that I am having with my connection with my Maxis Home Fibre 30 Mbps connection. Before this I could upload at a rate of 1.4 MBps per file to my server in the Amazon S3 datacenter but now, I can only achieve 250 kBps maximum. When the technician came today to investigate the matter, he said that he tried with his modem and the speed couldn't pick up as well.... He then conferred with a colleague from Maxis Technical and some technician named Mike without ever needing to come over and do anything said:"Oh his condo is on COPPER that's why cannot get good speed." Now guys, I am a technical person, I taught IT at Prime College sometime back and I have a Masters in IT from Open University Malaysia. I know about network latency and all that. I don't expect 1 file to be uploaded at 30 MBps / 8 = 3.75 MBps with no packet loss or network latency. The logic and answer from Mike - doesn't make sense. Why is it that I could upload at 1.4 MBps before and NOW the speeds just become 250 kBps? Don't tell me someone just came to my condo and replaced all my fibre wiring with copper. Don't make sense right?! I have been your customer for 18 months or so, and only TODAY I am complaining about speed loss. If I was not happy with your service, trust me, it won't take me 18 months to realize this! Speedtest results are kinda OK... I don't mind a bit of slowness, but speedtest results to USA is bad. I compared the speeds at office using a 20 Mbps UNIFI line and compare it with yours. I could sustain 800 kBps uploads there - which is pretty decent to me. So if Maxis is using TM as the backbone, why am I getting only 250 kBps?! Surely something is wrong. Please investigate further. You do not permission to close my case. In conjunction to the #iphone7 launch by Maxis on 14th October 2016, I was one of the early-bird customer to purchase the newly launched phone from #maxis. During the registration process, I was told that in oder for you to purchase the phone, you have to purchase at least one accessories from Maxis otherwise you will not allowed to purchase the phone, not even by signing up for their MaxisOne Plan as part of the package. But they gave y...ou an apple for that though (see picture enclosed.) It caught me by surprise, as nothing was mentioned on any T&C that this is part of their launch campaign. I was not happy but no choice by to adhere to their condition.I cannot accept this type of business strategy where you try in every ways to gain profit from your loyal subscriber which have been with you for more than a decade. Furthermore, Maxis earlier launched a pre-order campaign online on 7th October 2016, spending huge marketing dollars promoting it offering free 24 hours express delivery to your doorstep. As usual, I try to participate just to find out another disappointment on how they treat their existing customer. You only able to pre-order the phone in advance if you are either, a new customer to Maxis which convert from other telco, or sign-up a new line with Maxis. My question is, what happen to my existing number? The answer given to me was, you will have to wait for the launch on 14th October 2016, if you want to keep your existing number. I would like to re-affirm your weaknesses as one of the main telco in Malaysia, your guys have no clue on how to manage customer loyalty and retention strategy. Customer patience have a limit and stop testing it!  cc : Communications & Multimedia Consumer Forum of Malaysia, Suruhanjaya Komunikasi dan Multimedia Malaysia, Maxis, Maxis Still puzzled as to what our Maxis friend was doing there! Singapore has providers like M1 offering flagship phones like the Sony Z5 Premium for RM900 with RM160+ per month plans with free calls and 1200 SMS or something along those lines. Big shout-out to Maxis !!! #Nexstream #Maxis Last night, I accompanied my wife to a Maxis Center to purchase an iPhone. To our surprise, we were told that my wife's account is categorized as "Mass C" or whatever you call it, it means bad account according to your colleague. And because of that, we will have to make advance payment for the purchase. She's been a Maxis user for more than 10 years, never miss a single payment (as we have enabled auto-debit), monthly bills is always below the given credit limit, how can her... account be a bad account ? We made a call to the customer service helpline and after a really long conversation, giving all sorts of unsure possibilities, they concluded to us that the account is set to a bad account because there's this one time where she hit the credit limit, some time in 2012, which is a really unacceptable reason. Even if we hit the credit limit, it is not our problem, it simply means that you didn't allocate the credit limit well enough for us. It is really ridiculous and disappointing to find that her account has been categorized as bad account after being a loyal customer to Maxis for so many years. Anything that you can do for us ? LOSING CUSTOMERS IS MAXIS'S CURRENT TREND Hi Maxis,  Despite your lost of 377,000 subscribers in Quarter 4 of 2015, I find it surprising that you continued to treat your customers like craps, even to those who had been loyal with you for over 10 years. Since you're not able to stop your customers from porting out to other telcos, you purposely made their life hard when they submitted you the porting request. Maybe with a hope that perhaps the hassle will discourage them and m...ake them stay. Who the hell teach you that is the way to retain customers?  Hear my story in chronology. 4 October 2016 - I requested to port out from Maxis to UMobile.  5 October 2016 - UMobile acknowledged my request to join them.  6 - 12 October 2016 - I received UMobile's message of "We are still processing your porting request" everyday, exactly at 5pm, each time.  12 October 2016 - I bombarded my UMobile's sale persons with complaints as I'm still unable to use their services after more than 3 days. They showed me a screenshot which revealed that my MNP status was put on-hold. They told me they can't do anything about that & the customer (myself) will have to call Maxis in order to find out. I was very busy that week and haven't got a chance to call Maxis.  13 October 2016 - Maxis send me a SMS to confirm my request to leave them. I immediately replied YES.  14 October 2016 - This is when it gets very interesting.  At 12.22 pm: UMobile notify me through SMS that my porting request has been denied.  At 12.26 pm: Maxis notify me through SMS that they allow me to port out.  Was Maxis purposely delaying my request or they just want to show me that they are indeed much slower than UMobile?  At 10.30 pm: I gave Maxis a call and asked why I didn't received anything from them after almost 10 days I requested to port out.They claimed that on 5th October, they did sent me the SMS for confirmation to port-out but due to "system failure", the SMS never reached me. I demanded them to proof to me whether the system failure really did happen or they just made them up, so I'm very interested to know the outcome of my report no. C18282903. To Maxis, thank you so much for giving me such a hard time last week and I plan to lodge a report to MCMC next week (Malaysian Communications & Multimedia Commission). I have nothing else to say other than wishing you all the best in the only thing you guys are good at: Losing your customers to other telcos. #maxis ni service makin teruk..ujung bulan ni lau x ok lg mmg aku tukar..bosan..Asked to change to #maxisoneplan, but with same 5gb data, I need to pay extra rm23, what is the point #maxis? And their plans just get better, more value-for-money, and they recognize my long-standing loyalty and prompt payments by giving me priority for pre-sales of new phones, promotions, upgrades etc. My only dark patch with them was 3 years ago when I wasn't given a clear instruction on how to connect to their partner network in Dubai to enjoy a fixed data roaming rate. ...The moment I landed, I assumed the first network to tap onto my phone was their partner, so I continued.  Only to come home to a whopping RM3,000+ bill for 3D/2N of international roaming charges.  Sure. My mistake for assuming and not checking. I honestly told them I couldn't afford an immediate one-time payment of that amount, but at the same time needed my line to remain active. They understood, and arranged a recurring payment agreement for me where the amount was broken down and payable over 6 months, and they promised to keep my line active throughout for as long as my repayments are prompt. This was done at the Blue Cube outlet in TTDI. I kept to my promise. And they kept to theirs.  Such a deal may not be unique to Celcom, but the manner of which they empathized, understood and handled my plea in such a respectable and personal approach made me feel like they genuinely appreciate and value me as a customer. Maxis apa macam? Seems that you are just like some employers that only try to counter-offer a valuable staff AFTER he/she tenders his/her resignation. When they were there toiling and working hard for you, no recognitions given. But offer mind-blowing remunerations to get new talents on board, boleh. Want someone to talk about you like how I talk about Celcom? Pay attention to their grouses. And act on them. Pandai-pandai la jawab to your loyal customers.  Reputation Management mode +ON. Mana yg internet plan okay?  . Skrg pkai digi tp line slow kt rumah ğŸ˜ª I remember years ago when we were eagerly awaiting Streamyx to celebrate faster Internet speeds over dial up. It wasn't cheap, but it was good at the time. Then Unifi came, and we were thrilled at finally being able to stream videos with significantly less lag. Back then it was the kind of rare premium that most kids would hop over to their friend's Unifi enabled house to download stuff. Close to a decade later, Unifi became a standard. But never really grew. Connections felt... unstable, aged, and many feel shortchanged when we realized how other countries had faster Internet while we were paying a premium for below average connection speeds. It's like they gave up trying to be better.  This year, Maxis suffered the biggest fiasco when they deliberately shortchanged its customers by withholding value plans. Customers paid the same expensive amount for less of something some users had way more of. People generally don't like that.  Meanwhile, ministers claim that most people prefer slower Internet, not accounting the fact that it's become slower Internet is cheaper. Although TIME internet has less reach, it's beginning to receive the kind of fanfare that Unifi received long ago. Fast Internet speeds that are almost unheard of, and for the same price of a Unifi package that's archaic and much slower. Sure, Unifi offers HyppTV, but I can't even properly set up the damn thing and I couldn't care less. I signed up for fast internet, not bonus bloatware.  Like the time when people were waiting for Unifi to reach their area, now people are hoping for Time Internet.  Today I had the fortune of switching to TIME Internet. And it's amazing. For now.  I'm sure once the dust settles, TM might bounce back with a bigger comeback like what Maxis tried to do, or maybe plan sabotage or masking mediocrity to look like a premium, something like what Barisan Nasional would do.  Thanks to that infamous Facebook post this year, more people now know about Time. Including myself. It's fun to see competitions like this where the one standing to gain is the customer. I'm still waiting for Digi to do something while I continue giving it 3/10 stars every time I top up my Internet.  TM Unifi has a farther reach, that's why Everyone Connects, but it cannot enjoy being king for long. It needs to keep up with the TIMEs. Meanwhile, for the future of our country's Internet speeds, it's about TIME. My great mentor who guided me throughout my career in Maxis, thank you ;-)NEW update #maxis Last day working on 2016 ğŸ¤“ #working #maxis #hotlink #newyear #2016 #2017 Iâ€™m utterly disgusted and pissed off with Maxis! Recently I travelled to UK for 1 month to visit my parents. When I landed at Heathrow airport, I was suggested by Maxis to use the mobile operator O2 network for call roaming purposes.  During this period as I was traveling a lot and required Internet access on go as I run my own business and my agency was taking part in several important projects, I required internet access to check my mails and Skype / WhatsApp with my client...s or colleagues. I then opted for the Data Roam Pass which is RM38/day for 500MB which was sent via an SMS by Maxis. It was extremely bad in terms of coverage as I would be standing next to an existing O2 customer (my parents) who would have full coverage for calls and highest data speed but I would have the lowest or at time no coverage for calls and the slowest speed imaginable for data access. Unfortunately, I had no choice to use it throughout my trip as it was crunch time in my company.  I just received my bill and itâ€™s RM1500 for such terrible data roaming services. This is daylight robbery! Actually even â€œterribleâ€ is an under statement. It's utterly disgusting to know that Maxis charges their customers such amounts for such bad service. If it was great service, I would be more than happy to pay for it. The issue is that the bill doesn't justify the bad connection I got throughout my trip there. If Maxis is using the O2 network then I must be able to get the same coverage and data speeds while standing next to another O2 user. I am aware that I could have used a dual sim phone or gotten a prepaid. I think I am frustrated that I was willing to pay the RM38 per day but instead I hardly managed to get coverage or data connection. Even my supplementary line had the same problem while there! It goes to show their incompetence as a service provider and their direct neglect towards a customers needs. I expect an investigation into my complaint, an explanation for the bad connection and an adjustment to my bill. Moving forward, I think I should seriously have to reconsider other telcos Xpax Tune Talk or U Mobile. Congratulations to Carrie Yap Pei Ling! All this while I have been a Maxis user and have been paying rm50 for my monthly bills excluding calls and sms which normally come up to rm60ish a month and I would round it up by paying rm70. I found out other telcos are offering a better deal (cheaper for more data) so I decided to port out.  The very evening I got a call from Maxis saying that they are increasing my data to 5GB (formally 2GB) and all calls and sms are free and is plan free and my bill will come up to about... rm 71 monthly. Thinking that since I am alrdy paying that amount for only 2GB I  agreed to the offer. Then the other day I got a sms fr Maxis saying that they hv upgraded my plan to Maxis One and I have to pay rm158!! I never asked to be upgraded and defiantly not paying that much for my bill!! I think It's very unethical of Maxis to trick their customers!! When I went to see them they told me actually I am suppose to pay that amount for 5GB and it's a two yr plan!! I told them that was not wat I was told over the phone . I was told that there was no contract to this upgrade! When I ask them why am I charged so much they say that the rm158 is before rebate and after rebate will b paying rm71. What rubbish why was I not told all this when they called me?? Dear maxis...i don't know what the hell is going on to you...1 word...Go To Hell!!! Apakah promosi Internet PERCUMA sepanjang hayat ini? Para pelanggan yang melanggan Pelan Hotlink FAST dalam tempoh promosi akan menikmati 2GB PERCUMA setiap minggu, sepanjang hayat. Para pelanggan akan menikmati 1GB 4G/ LTE pada hari Sabtu, dan 1GB 4G/ LTE pada hari Ahad untuk setiap minggu.  ===... Bilakah saya akan dapat menikmati Pas 2GB PERCUMA Hujung Minggu dan bagaimanakah saya boleh menggunakannya? Pas PERCUMA akan dikreditkan setelah kad SIM anda diaktifkan. Pas ini akan diperbaharui sebelum 00:00 pg. setiap hari Sabtu. 2GB PERCUMA sah digunakan untuk:    (i) setiap minggu (1GB untuk hari Sabtu, 1GB untuk Ahad)   (ii) rangkaian Maxis 4G/ LTE   (iii) selagi akaun Hotlink anda aktif Pelanggan-pelanggan Hotlink yang bertukar pelan ke Pelan Hotlink Fast turut akan menikmati internet percuma 2GB Sabtu Ahad. Pas-pas yang dibawa ke hadapan dari pelan lama hendaklah habis digunakan terlebih dahulu sebelum pas percuma 2GB Sabtu Ahad boleh digunakan. === Bagaimanakah saya boleh menikmati kuota 4G/LTE? (i) Pastikan anda menggunakan peranti sedia 4G/ LTE (ii) Pastikan anda mempunyai kad SIM sedia 4G LTE (kunjungi Pusat Maxis terdekat anda untuk menaik taraf kad SIM anda secara PERCUMA) (iii) Pasang 4G atau LTE pada peranti mudah alih anda (iv) Pastikan anda dalam liputan rangkaian 4G LTE === Sampai bilakah saya dapat menikmati PERCUMA 2GB 4G pada hujung minggu? Semua pelanggan yang melanggan pelan Hotlink FAST dalam tempoh promosi akan dapat menikmati faedah ini untuk sepanjang hayat selagi kad SIM yang diaktifkan kekal aktif dalam Pelan Hotlink FAST.  === Saya mempunyai Pas yang aktif pada hari Sabtu/ Ahad. Kuota yang manakah akan digunakan dahulu? Penggunaan kuota adalah berdasarkan turutan berikut:     1) Pas-pas Harian     2) Pas PERCUMA Internet 4G Sabtu & Ahad     3) Pas Mingguan/ Bulanan === Adakah saya akan dimaklumkan tentang status penggunaan internet saya? Ya, anda akan dimaklumkan apabila mencapai tahap penggunaan kuota sebanyak 80% dan 100%. === Saya telah 100% kehabisan kuota PERCUMA 1GB hari Sabtu sebelum hari Ahad. Bolehkah saya terus melayari internet? Adakah terdapat caj yang akan dikenakan? Anda masih boleh kekal berhubung dengan Chat Sosial PERCUMA tanpa dikenakan sebarang caj. Untuk penggunaan internet kelajuan tinggi, sila langgan Pas Internet daripada Aplikasi Hotlink RED (muat turun secara PERCUMA di AppStore/ Google Playstore) atau dail *100#> Pas Internet. === Akaun saya kini berada dalam tempoh tidak aktif & saya tidak dapat menggunakan pas hujung minggu PERCUMA. Bagaimanakah saya dapat mengaktifkan akaun saya semula? Tambah Nilai untuk kekal aktif. ** Harap maklum bahawa pengaktifan semula melalui pemindahan kredit (cth. Ask-A-TopUp, Share-A-TopUp, Post-Aid-TopUp, SOS-Top-Up, Maxis Pay & M-Money) tidak sah untuk pas PERCUMA 2GB Hujung Minggu. Then as usual, it takes the whole day(if not more) to get through to Maxis technical support team. I would usually let things like this slip if it does not happen so frequently that it becomes a habit and you start to see a pattern here. Customer service Astro baru call aku ni berkaitan masalah Wi-fi aku yang tak selesai-selesai tu.  "Encik Shah kami dah semak dengan Maxis, masalah wi-fi di tempat encik dah congested. Encik kena beli wi-fi extension device untuk dapatkan capaian yang baik" Aku rilek lagi dan jawab.... "Kenapa saya pula kena beli device sedangkan Maxis yang patut upgrade dia punya service? Masa i nak masuk line ni dulu cakap takde masalah apa pun. Janji semua elok je. Sekarang ni dah sebulan lebih masalah? Maxis perlu selesaikan bukan customer yang kena beli extra hardware" Dia balas. "Tapi encik, memang itu sahaja caranya..." Aku potong terus. "Ada caranya. Caranya you suruh bos you upgrade service bukan suruh customer beli macam-macam." "Mereka akan uruskan encik tapi..." Aku potong lagi. "Uruskan apa? Dah sebulan lebih ni tak selesai-selesai. Last-last kata kena beli device." "Tapi encik wi-fi di tempat encik memang dah jammed. Line encik sepatutnya digunakan bersama LAN Cable" Aku terus naik angin. "LAN cable? You nak I cucuk cable pada iphone I ni ke? Hey, come on. Ni 2017, orang dah tak pakai cable. Bukan 1998. Tahu tak? 1998 ya orang pakai cable untuk internet. Tapi bukan 2017. Be reasonable. Dont close this case. Ask your boss upgrade the service. And its not my problem when your line get congested. Its your boss problem and they need to settel it soon. Dont simply call customer and tell us all this shit. Settle it soon, let them know about this. Ingat jangan tutup repot I sampai kes dah selesai, I bayar macam biasa setiap bulan bukan untuk service macam ni" "Tapi encik..." "Takde tapi-tapi. Selesaikan masalah ni bukan dengan suruh customer beli barang lain" "Baiklah encik kami tengok balik perkara ni" "Yes please. Dont close the report" Setan punya Astro dengan Maxis. Menipu pengguna. Tiada pendaftaran, tiada caj tambahan, hanya dengan satu SMS ke 33122. 1J <jarak> Tempoh (30 minit, 1-10 jam) & No Kenderaan <jarak> No Petak Pakir... Contoh: 1J 30JNV6230 5C10                1J 1JML8700 5C10  Atau download Apps SMSParkir dari Playstore/Appstore. Sangat mudah, caj ditolak dari kredit prepaid/postpaid, setiap bayaran dgn SMSParkir akan dipaparkan pada handheld Penguatkuasa MPJBT. Anda boleh meletakkan kenderaan di mana2 parking lot dalam kawasan MPJBT selagi tempoh parkir belum tamat. Contoh: bayar parking di Bukit Indah, masa berbaki 1jam boleh parking di Taman Perling... hebat kan. Pendaftran masih dibuka Salam sejahtera, Disebabkan masalah gangguan perkhidmatan internet Maxis Home Fibre yang dilanggan bersama Astro IPTV saya yang tidak selesai semenjak 26 Disember 2016 yang lalu (Sebenarnya lebih lama tapi 26hb baru hubungi Customer Service) maka dengan ini saya memohon untuk membuat temujanji berjumpa dengan CEO Astro secara berhadapan. Ini supaya beliau boleh mendengar sendiri masalah yang dihadapi pengguna terutama berkaitan kegagalan pihak Astro dalam menyelesaikan masala...h yang dihadapi.  Memandangkan kegagalan pihak teknikal Astro menyelesaikan masalah saya dengan hanya memberi nasihat "beli device tambahan untuk rangkaian WIFI yang lebih laju atau gunakan kabel LAN untuk capaian internet yang baik". Ini adalah sesuatu yang tidak boleh diterima akal seorang manusia padah tahun 2017. Ini juga bukan servis yang patut diperolehi oleh seorang pengguna. Sila aturkan temujanji ini secepat mungkin. Jika pihak admin page ini tidak mampu berbuat demikian sila kemukakan nombor telefon pejabat CEO untuk saya aturkan temujanji bersama setiausaha beliau. Saya boleh dihubungi melalui talian 012-3641830, segala kerjasama dan perhatian admin yang bertugas amatlah dihargai. Sebelum saya terlupa, tolong jangan reply menggunakan skrip "sila berikan nombor akaun anda untuk pemeriksaan lanjut" kerana saya telah bosan dengan skrip jawapan yang ditulis kumpulan pemikir Astro tetapi tidak dapat menyelesaikan masalah. Yang benar, Shah Rafi Pengguna Astro (Sebenarnya ramai dah nasihat suruh terminate) baruk ada line ğŸ˜­ oh maxis  ğŸ˜­ berantakan cod ari tok ğŸ˜¢ m1 Prepaid Card with 100GB Data vs my Maxis Post-paid monthly 5GB Data !! Seh andik nomer ofis maxis pm I have been a maxis fiber optic internet subscriber in Bandar Utama Petaling Jaya for nearly two years now. My contract was coming to an end when I received a phone call from maxis asking if i would like to upgrade the package from 10mb to 20mb. The only downside is that the contract period will automatically renew itself, meaning that it would be another 2 long years (& offcourse I would have to pay a higher monthly fee). Seeing that I have no plans to relocate any time in t...he near future, I agreed. But just few days after that, my connection started becoming unstable, until it was absolutely impossible to connect at all. Filed a case report to maxis and as usual all i got was a case number. Then as usual, it takes the whole day(if not more) to get through to Maxis technical support team. And as usual, would be told that it would take 48 hours before anything could be done, as in they might sent a tech person to check on the problem. By now, you should have noticed from what I've written that this is not the first time I am experiencing this. The last time this happened was a mere few weeks ago. And i did not have any internet connection for days, yet I would still have to pay for the full month's fee + GST. I would usually let things like this slip if it does not happen so frequently that it becomes a habit and you start to see a pattern here. And also if the customer service or support team could be more helpful and understanding instead of sounding like people who hate their jobs and are taking it out on paying customers like us. I demand that something be done to improve your service before you start promising more to customers just to squeeze more money out of us while giving us the same crappy (if not crappier service). If nothing is done and i don't see this matter being solve ASAP, and I have to wait until after CNY for my internet connection to resume functioning, then trust me when I say that I won't let this go so easily this time. Last but not least, happy freaking CNY. See more Nak minta pendapat sahabat yang menggunakan talian Celcom. Setakat ini adakah anda berpuas hati dengan perkhidmatannya? Trima kasih tuan kerana menge \ Ok tuan..nnti sya akan whatsapp..\ud83d\ude03 Trima kasih tlong up tuan..\ud83d\ude03 Nak bisnes boleh tuan..rm90 je pakej subdealer..dpat 5 simkad dan sistem full akses...boleh start jual dah..\u263a Ouhh...sya baru lagi brjinak2..tu yg tak kenal..maafkan sya tuan.. Beza dia internet takde capped speed..laju smpai 100\u0025 pnggunaan data,tiada PPU(pay per use) ,contoh klau data abis takkan mkan kredit..tempoh sah panjang selama 2thun 4blan(diganjakkan lagi stiap kali topup)..dan pling penting ianya adalah telco pertama patuh syariah...klau tuan brminat boleh wasap saya 0125414354 ..\ud83d\ude0a Trima kasih tuan Adam Bondod..sya akan pm tuan..Yer tuan..betul tu...bile pkai baru rase jimat dia camne..takde menindas pngguna...xde syarat merapu2...internet xde capped speed...takde kecurian kredit...takde ape lagi ye..byak lagi ni manfaat dripda onexox telco patuh shariah ni..\ud83d\ude0a\ud83d\udc4d Tuan boleh wasap sya 0125414354 (ajak) atau tuan boleh tingglkan no fon dan sya akan wasap tuan kmudian..\ud83d\ude03 Trima kasih tuan tlong up page sya.. Tak..expired ikut tmpoh sah kredit kita..katakan 2020,maka data tu leh simpan smpai 2020..klau nk guna ,baru kita subsribe from season pass..kene guna dulu,baru kita tau powernye season pass ni yg tiada pada telco lain tuan..\ud83d\ude0a Tq up tuan..yeahh out there we are one..kipidap!!\u270a Paling best beli seasons pass...rm109.90 8gb + 50mnit free call ke mana2 rngkaian....jatuh pada hrga rm13.75 1gb..internet xde capped speed dan xde PPU(pay per use)..expired data ikut expired date kita..\ud83d\ude0a,katakan expired date kita 2020..maka 8gb tu boleh simpan smpai 2020.. Maxis bro ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ U should try celcom first gold 80 ğŸ˜… Abg pilih yg mana? Yg biru atau hijau? Yg biru lbh quota, yg hijau sama saja Aku pengguna postaid utk keduak2 telco ya, Maxis and Celcom. Kelebihan Maxis, nya lebih laju compared to Celcom, ada unlimited 1am-7am (hanya utk plan MOP Sabah Swak, tp knek dh xda gik plan ya), ada free weekend 4G kuota (contoh ko langgan 5GB, ko akan dpt weekend 5GB 4G tp mun line ko 3G ko x dpt nikmati weekend free ya). Kekurangan Maxis, nya lebih cepat habis kuota, coverage x meluas (xda line Maxis di sstgh tempat terutamanya luar bandar), harga lebih mahal compared to the other telco. Kelebihan Celcom, of course coverage meluas, harga pun x jaoh beza dgn telco lain, kuota x cpt abis, tp kekurangan Celcom ada split data weekend and weekdays (contoh ko langgan 20GB, nya akan split kan 10GB utk weekdays, 10GB utk weekend), xda unlimited midnight, and sometimes line Celcom boleh jd slow. Hi Hadi, thank you for highlighting this matter to us. We do take this very seriously as we committed in protecting your Personal Information when you're with us; so that you'll have a peace of mind whenever you supply your personal information to us.\r\n\nFor example: SIM Replacement , please be advised that for any SIM replacement, customers are required to walk in to the nearest center, perform verification first, all our Maxis Centers are equipped with bio-metric for fingerprint authentication. Jika melalui WiFi, sila tukar WiFi channel & pantau. Ikuti langkah berikut untuk tukar saluran WiFi anda - \r\n1. Buka Internet browser (eg: Internet Explorer or Google Chrome) & login http://192.168.1.254 \r\n    **Kalau boleh guna LAN connection. kalau tiada LAN cable, anda masih boleh teruskan\r\n2. Klik pada Wireless\r\n3. Klik Configure > kanan page tersebut\r\n4. Channel Selection > tukar kepada manual\r\n5. Pilih saluran dari 1-13 dan pantau\r\n\nTerima kasih. Saya menggunakan wifi. Saya sudah buka link yang diberi tapi saya tidak faham apa perlu dipantau dan bagaimana nak tukar saluran wifi. Penjelasan lebih terperinci mungkin?Ikuti langkah yg kami berikan. Hi, when you are abroad with your MaxisONE plan, any calls (received or made), any SMS sent, any data used (via webpages, apps, and all other platforms) will automatically kick start your MaxisONE World pass. Charges are as Tier 1: RM10 - Call less than 3mins, send 1-3 SMS, use less than 256kb data & Tier 2: RM38 - Call more than 3mins, send more than 3 SMS, use more than 256kb data. There are different tiers for Singapore. You may refer to http://www.maxis.com.my/content/maxis/en/personal/services/addons/idd-and-roaming/oneworld.html for more info on MaxisONE World pass. TQ MaxisONE World comes together with MaxisONE Plan and you can use call less than 3mins, send 1-3 SMS, use less than 256kb data for RM10. But it will only charge you maximum of RM38/day and you can enjoy worry free browsing, unlimited calls via Direct Dial in roaming country, Malaysia and other countries and also via Roam120 dial pattern. You can also enjoy unlimited incoming calls as well. TQ Change Digi Hi, please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience you have been subjected to as a result of the issues above. Utk kepastian kol je maxis centre Tu la nmpk sngt  pernipuan dia Jgn mudah percaya ma mira Pernah kena juga mcm ni sy pun dia nk bgi rm5000 ..sy layan ckp dia..sama lah mcm mma Mira suh pi ATM .sy ckp sy tk ada kenderaan nk pegi..sy suruh dia hantar    Cek kat sy ..dia ckp dia nk bgi cash pastu sy terus ckp ok you dtg hantar kat rmh sy ..ermmm mcm2 alasan dia bgi ..akhirnya sy ckp ok nanti i call maxis centre hehe terus dia ltk fon... Sy pun call maxis centre cerita apa yg terjadi ...pegawai maxis tu ckp .syarikat pun tk ada duit nk bgi kat pelanggan byk tu rm5000 cash pulak tu.....saja je nk menipu kita tu ..suara pun mcm indon. Ya Allah memang orng indon pun huhu sebj cam u ckp Lagi satu dia call bkn pakai nombor office tapi no handphone .. Era prnh dpt mesej gitu mama.. Era balas balik dgn sy sedekahkn balik pd maxis.. Hahaha Kayo la mama... Hehe jgn caya ... Tak caya pun Noraliza Leeza nmpk nipu nya Suki pulak..dpt msg dr ambank..suh settlekan bayaran loan pending..suki tak pnh pn pakai ambank..apa lagi buat loan...kemain sgt...lebih 10kali anta msg cmniPenipu benor2 tuh adoiii Aritu mak pun ada ckp ada org kol bgth menang.no mak guna ats nama yul...nk menipu x agak2...org tu bg brim pun kena isi borang kemain pjg beratur.ni nk bg 5k sng2 gitu..pirahhh.. Tau tak pe kerjaan nk menipu je huhu ..geram haishhhh Kat sini pun sama jg salina Tukar celcom laa kak
